panels.title: Pod CPU Usage (% of one CPU core)

targets.expr:
(
    sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container_image_tag, container_name) or on (container_name)
    clamp_max(absent(notExists{container_name="aio-dp-reader-worker", container_image_tag=" "}),0)
) or
(
    sum(rate(aio_dp_runner_info{cluster=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container_image_tag, container_name) or on (container_name)
    clamp_max(absent(notExists{container_name="aio-dp-runner-worker", container_image_tag=" "}),0)
) or
(
    sum(rate(aio_dp_refdata_global_ingest_count{cluster=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container_image_tag, container_name) or on (container_name)
    clamp_max(absent(notExists{container_name="aio-dp-refdata-store", container_image_tag=" "}), 0)
) or
(
    sum(rate(aio_dp_reconcile_event{cluster=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container_image_tag, container_name) or on (container_name)
    clamp_max(absent(notExists{container_name="manager", container_image_tag=" "}), 0)
)

(
    count(count(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster", container="aio-dp-reader-worker"}) by (container, pod)) by (container) or on (container)
    clamp_max(absent(notExists{container="aio-dp-reader-worker"}),0)
) or
(
    count(count(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster", container="aio-dp-runner-worker"}) by (container, pod)) by (container) or on (container)
    clamp_max(absent(notExists{container="aio-dp-runner-worker"}),0)
) or
(
    count(count(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster", container="aio-dp-refdata-store"}) by (container, pod)) by (container) or on (container)
    clamp_max(absent(notExists{container="aio-dp-refdata-store"}), 0)
) or
(
    count(count(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster", container="manager", pod=~"aio-dp-.*"}) by (container, pod)) by (container) or on (container)
    clamp_max(absent(notExists{container="manager"}), 0)
)
